description: Chilim Balam is the first retail and franchise candy store chain in Mexico, offering more than 500 varieties of chocolates, sweet snacks and other Mexican delicacies sold at commercial centers and malls.
Chime Solutions provides high-touch customer service solutions in the BPO space to enterprise clients.
Cibecs provides enterprises with software that ensures the fastest and easiest backup of valuable information on desktop and notebook computers.
As a pioneering tech company in gifts, CicekSepeti.com’s vision is to lead other verticals in ecommerce.
Cinepapaya provided a platform for online and mobile movie ticketing sales. It was acquired by Fandango in 2016.
Circuit Clinical provides a tech-enabled turnkey clinical trials program that quickly creates fully equipped, high-performing clinical trial sites.
Civitanavi produces cutting-edge Fiber Optic Gyroscopes (FOGs) that are used to determine location, attitude, and compass heading in situations where GPS systems and compasses are not viable.
Classera is an e-learning platform that combines gamification and artificial intelligence to help schools digitize their education.
CLEVVA is a web-based platform that allows low-coding teams to build, maintain and deploy front office digital workers in hightly regulated / restricted environments (e.g. financial services).
Closca designs genuine products that integrate seamlessly into society while harnessing the latest innovation and technology.
Cloud4Wi uses Wi-Fi networks to provide retail brands with AI-generated analytics that help them increase customer conversion rates.
Cobli offers an IoT hardware and SaaS fleet management solution that increases productivity and enables more efficient use of fleet assets across business processes.

Codemotion is a platform that enables developers’
professional growth by connecting IT professionals,
tech communities and companies.
Cognician helps employees and teams develop new habits by encouraging reflection and self-expression, and helping learners to follow through over time on the commitment to change.
Cognira uses AI to help retailers make better decisions in merchandising and supply chain operations, improving forecast accuracy, product selection and promotion strategies.
Cognitev is an artificial intelligence company that is focused on semantic technologies and their applications in the digital marketing world.

Coins offers customers a mobile wallet and services such as remittances, mobile air-time, bill payments, and online shopping. Coins was acquired by GoJek in 2019. Ron now serves as an Independent Director at Unionbank and is an early stage investor in technology companies.
Colegium develops and implements integrated school management software systems for Latin American primary schools.
Founded in February 2017, Colendi is a leading Turkish fintech, delivering payments, micro-credit, and micro-invest services via dedicated apps.
Commercial Insurance offers a wide variety of insurance products ranging from life insurance to medical, property, automotive, and innovative new insurance solutions.
